COMPOUND INTEREST

```{r}
# INPUT
principal = 10000
rate = 0.15
compoundings = 4
time = 35

# PROCESSING
amount = principal * (1+ (rate/compoundings))^ (compoundings * time)

# OUTPUT
print (amount)
```
*** This example calculates compund interest using vairables, operators, and expressions
